name: P.S.I.O.N.
description:
This is P.S.I.O.N. a game I helped to create as part of my Capstone project for Full Sail University. Our team came together and created an original game in four months. 

Created by: Deontae Jackson, Burke Kearney, Corey Strobbe, Spencer Lain, Hallie Thatcher, Oliver Thompson
